Title: Relates to effectiveness of judgments entered by the New York City environmental control board; repealer
Summary: Removes the eight year expiration for judgments entered by the New York City environmental control board.
LawCode: Rpld §1049-a sub d ¶1 sub¶ (i), NYC Chart
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal certain provisions of the New York city charter relating to the eight year limitation on the effectiveness of judgments of the environmental control board
